member.name: T:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter
member.summary: ACL conversion helper methods. Provides bidirectional conversion between internal ACL representations and S3 API objects.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter.BucketAclsToPolicy(System.Collections.Generic.List{Less3.Classes.BucketAcl},Less3.Classes.User,Less3.Classes.ConfigManager,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Converts bucket ACLs to an AccessControlPolicy for API responses.
member.param: List of bucket ACLs to convert.
Logging module for warnings about misconfigured ACLs.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.returns: AccessControlPolicy containing owner information and grants.
member.exception: Thrown when owner, config, or logging is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter.ObjectAclsToPolicy(System.Collections.Generic.List{Less3.Classes.ObjectAcl},Less3.Classes.User,Less3.Classes.ConfigManager,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Converts object ACLs to an AccessControlPolicy for API responses.
member.param: List of object ACLs to convert.
Logging module for warnings about misconfigured ACLs.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.returns: AccessControlPolicy containing owner information and grants.
member.exception: Thrown when owner, config, or logging is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter.PolicyToBucketAcls(S3ServerLibrary.S3Objects.AccessControlPolicy,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,Less3.Classes.User,System.String,System.String,Less3.Classes.ConfigManager,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Converts an AccessControlPolicy and request headers to a list of bucket ACLs.
member.param: AccessControlPolicy from request body. May be null.
HTTP request headers containing ACL grants. May be null.
Logging module for warnings about invalid grants.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.returns: List of BucketAcl objects ready for database insertion.
member.exception: Thrown when currentUser, config, or logging is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter.PolicyToObjectAcls(S3ServerLibrary.S3Objects.AccessControlPolicy,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,Less3.Classes.User,System.String,System.String,System.String,Less3.Classes.ConfigManager,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Converts an AccessControlPolicy and request headers to a list of object ACLs.
member.param: AccessControlPolicy from request body. May be null.
HTTP request headers containing ACL grants. May be null.
GUID of the bucket containing the object.
Logging module for warnings about invalid grants.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.returns: List of ObjectAcl objects ready for database insertion.
member.exception: Thrown when currentUser, config, or logging is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.AclConverter.GrantsFromHeaders(Less3.Classes.User,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,Less3.Classes.ConfigManager)
member.summary: Extracts ACL grants from HTTP request headers. Supports canned ACLs and individual grant headers.
member.param: User making the request. Used for 'private' canned ACL.
HTTP request headers to parse. May be null.
Configuration manager for user email/GUID lookups.
member.returns: List of Grant objects parsed from headers. Empty list if no grants found.
member.exception: Thrown when user or config is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.HashHelper.ComputeHashes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compute MD5, SHA1, and SHA256 hashes of the supplied data.
member.param: Byte array containing data to hash.
member.returns: HashResult containing MD5, SHA1, and SHA256 hashes in lowercase hexadecimal format.
member.exception: Thrown when data is null.

member.name: T:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator
member.summary: Request validation helper methods. Provides common validation patterns used across API handlers.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateAndGetMetadata(S3ServerLibrary.S3Context,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that request metadata can be retrieved from the S3Context.
member.param: Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.returns: RequestMetadata object containing authentication and authorization information.
member.exception: Thrown when ctx or logging is null.
Thrown with InternalError when metadata cannot be retrieved.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateAuthorization(Less3.Classes.RequestMetadata,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the request is authorized.
member.param: Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when md or logging is null.
Thrown with AccessDenied when authorization check fails.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateBucketExists(Less3.Classes.RequestMetadata,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the bucket exists and has an associated client.
member.param: Request metadata containing bucket and bucket client references.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when md or logging is null.
Thrown with NoSuchBucket when bucket or bucket client is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateAuthentication(Less3.Classes.RequestMetadata,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that the user is authenticated.
member.param: Request metadata containing user and credential references.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when md or logging is null.
Thrown with AccessDenied when user or credential is null.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ParseVersionId(S3ServerLibrary.S3Context)
member.summary: Parses and validates the version ID from the S3 request context. Default value is 1 if no version ID is specified.
member.param: S3 request context containing version ID string.
member.returns: Parsed version ID as a long integer. Returns 1 if version ID is not specified.
member.exception: Thrown when ctx is null.
Thrown with NoSuchVersion when version ID cannot be parsed as a valid long integer.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateObjectExists(Less3.Classes.Obj,System.Int64,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that an object exists and throws appropriate exceptions based on version ID.
member.param: Object metadata. Null indicates object does not exist.
Version ID being requested. Used to determine appropriate error message.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when logging is null.
Thrown with NoSuchKey when object is null and versionId is 1. Thrown with NoSuchVersion when object is null and versionId is greater than 1.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.CheckDeleteMarker(Less3.Classes.Obj,S3ServerLibrary.S3Context)
member.summary: Checks if the object is marked as deleted and sets appropriate response headers.
member.param: Object metadata to check for delete marker.
S3 request context for setting response headers.
member.exception: Thrown when obj or ctx is null.
Thrown with NoSuchKey when object has a delete marker. Response headers will include delete marker indicator.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateUploadId(S3ServerLibrary.S3Context,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Parses and validates the upload ID from the S3 request context.
member.param: S3 request context containing upload ID string.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when ctx or logging is null.
Thrown with InvalidRequest when upload ID is null or empty.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidateUpload(Less3.Classes.Upload,System.String,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a multipart upload record exists and has not expired.
member.param: Upload record from database. Null indicates upload does not exist.
Upload ID being validated. Used for error logging.
Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when logging is null.
Thrown with NoSuchUpload when upload is null or has expired.

member.name: M:Less3.Helpers.RequestValidator.ValidatePartNumber(System.Int32,SyslogLogging.LoggingModule,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a part number is within valid range for multipart uploads. Valid range is 1 to 10000 inclusive.
member.param: Log header prefix for consistent log formatting.
member.exception: Thrown when logging is null.
Thrown with InvalidArgument when part number is less than 1 or greater than 10000.
